MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling, affecting properties in Cecil Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.24pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the unplanned electricity fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.29pm on Friday 6th November 2020.
